entry.title: "Trace Tales: Unveiling the Secrets of Network Traces on Azure App Services"
entry.summary:
In recent news, it has been revealed that RFK Jr and the Golden Bachelor have both utilized the services of the same stylist, as indicated by FEC filings. This unexpected connection between the two figures has sparked curiosity and speculation among the public. In another development, Tuum, a core banking technology challenger, has successfully secured â‚¬25 million in a Series B funding round. This significant investment will enable Tuum to expand its operations into new territories, further disrupting the traditional banking sector. Additionally, Flaunt, a company specializing in enterprise loyalty cloud solutions for platforms like Roblox and Shopify Plus, has raised $1.8 million in funding. This financial boost will aid Flaunt in enhancing its loyalty programs and providing innovative solutions to its clients.

In terms of new tools, products, or projects, there have been notable advancements. One such example is the guide on capturing network traces on Azure App Services for both Windows and Linux. This resource offers valuable insights and instructions for individuals and businesses utilizing Azure App Services, enabling them to effectively monitor and analyze network activity. This tool will undoubtedly prove beneficial in optimizing network performance and troubleshooting issues.
